documentation.text: @notice Interface for the XAO token contract
@notice Mapping of addresses to their stake information
@notice Total amount of tokens staked in the contract

@notice Minimum duration required for staking without penalty
 @dev Set to one quarter (90 days)
@notice Base multiplier for calculating reputation
@notice Penalty percentage for early withdrawal (10%)
@notice Quarterly reward rate (5%)

@notice Emitted when reward rate is updated
 @param newRate New reward rate

@notice Pauses all staking operations
 @dev Can only be called by the contract owner

@notice Resumes all staking operations
 @dev Can only be called by the contract owner

@notice Claims available rewards
 @dev Transfers calculated rewards to user

devdoc.author: XAO Protocol Team
devdoc.details: Implements staking with time-based reputation, rewards, and early withdrawal penalties

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

calculateRewards(address).details: Based on stake amount and time elapsed

constructor.details: Sets up the XAO token interface

params._xaoToken: Address of the XAO token contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Can only be called by the contract owner

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

stake(uint256).details: Transfers tokens from user to contract and updates stake info

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Can only be called by the contract owner

updateRewardRate(uint256).details: Can only be called by the contract owner

withdraw(uint256).details: Applies early withdrawal penalty if applicable

devdoc.title: XAO Staking Contract

RewardRateUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when reward rate is updated

MIN_STAKE_DURATION().notice: Minimum duration required for staking without penalty

getStakeInfo(address).notice: Gets detailed stake information for a user

getVotingPower(address).notice: Gets the voting power of a user

stakes(address).notice: Mapping of addresses to their stake information

totalStaked().notice: Total amount of tokens staked in the contract

xaoToken().notice: Interface for the XAO token contract

userdoc.notice: This contract manages the staking mechanism for XAO tokens
